mapper.sql: id, item_no, use_item_no, use_item_count, use_item_measure, fixed_use, vari_use, fixed_use_assist, vari_use_assist, item_measure_assist, use_item_type, updated_by, updated_time, created_by, created_time
mapper.select: select mis.item_name, mis.item_no, mis.item_measure, mis.item_model, mis.item_count_assist, mis.item_measure_assist, mis.bom_no from mes_item_stock mis inner join mes_item_use miu on mis.item_no = miu.item_no where miu.use_item_no = #{itemNo}
